subject: RE: RE: hss newsletter - Image for https://hssaustralia.com.au/colorectal-lesions-and-cancer-screening/
preview: Help Joao understand how they’re doing:

full_threads.body:
Hi James,


The image is already updated in the newsletter.


Regarding the caption below the image, do you have any preference for the copy?


Thanks

Hi there ..

It probably does need a caption … maybe 4 or 5 words or a sentence

Let us know

Joao .. could you also use the same photo for the newsletter too directing the reader to this feature?

https://hssaustralia.com.au/colorectal-lesions-and-cancer-screening/

CHEERS

JAMES

From: mailfarzan@gmail.com [mailto:notifications@intercom-mail.com]
Sent: Thursday, 19 July 2018 8:40 AM
To: James Croll <JamesCroll@hssaustralia.com.au>
Subject: Re: RE: hss newsletter - Image for https://hssaustralia.com.au/colorectal-lesions-and-cancer-screening/

Sent to James Croll

hi see attached. should I annotate / explain figure too?

https://static.intercom-mail-300.com/assets/emails/v01/attachments-icon-4a8273964467258be28bc97c132b84aa086fe328380ed104f690419887beccf6.png

Slide1.JPG

Powered by Intercom

On Thu, Jul 19, 2018 at 08:39 AM, "mailfarzan@gmail.com" <mailfarzan@gmail.com> wrote:

hi see attached. should I annotate / explain figure too?

https://static.intercom-mail-300.com/assets/emails/v01/attachments-icon-4a8273964467258be28bc97c132b84aa086fe328380ed104f690419887beccf6.png

Slide1.JPG

On Wed, Jul 18, 2018 at 04:54 PM, "James Croll" <jamescroll@hssaustralia.com.au> wrote:

Hi Farzan …

Can you send this to me and our web guys who I’ve cc’d in?

THANKS

JAMES

On Wed, Jul 18, 2018 at 04:54 PM, "James Croll" <jamescroll@hssaustralia.com.au> wrote:

Hi Farzan …

Can you send this to me and our web guys who I’ve cc’d in?

THANKS

JAMES

From: Farzan [mailto:mailfarzan@gmail.com]
Sent: Monday, 16 July 2018 8:45 PM
To: James Croll <JamesCroll@hssaustralia.com.au>
Subject: Re: hss newsletter

Looks good James

I think it would be nice to include a collage of a large polyp being resected to provide readers with better graphic illustration of the text. Have I sent you some?

Cheers

F

On Mon, 16 Jul. 2018, 17:19 James Croll, <JamesCroll@hssaustralia.com.au> wrote:

Hi Farzan

Is the following ok? It will go out this Wednesday in our enewsletter.

https://hssaustralia.com.au/colorectal-lesions-and-cancer-screening/

CHEERS

JAMES

James Croll

Marketing Manager

HOSPITAL FOR SPECIALIST SURGERY
17-19 Solent Circuit, Bella Vista 2153

P: 02 8624 5000 ● Fax: 02 8711 0577

www.hssaustralia.com.au

Direct: 02 8711 0505 ● Ext: 505

Email: jamescroll@hssaustralia.com.au

PATIENTS FIRST.

From: Farzan [mailto:mailfarzan@gmail.com]
Sent: Sunday, 11 March 2018 10:00 AM
To: James Croll <JamesCroll@hssaustralia.com.au>
Subject: Re: draft

i've attached in ppt format to make it easier

ta

On 5 March 2018 at 09:44, James Croll <JamesCroll@hssaustralia.com.au> wrote:

Hi Farzan ..

Great. I’d say 3 or 4 photos would work well.

Send them with suggested captions

THANKS

JAMES

From: Farzan [mailto:mailfarzan@gmail.com]
Sent: Sunday, 4 March 2018 11:50 PM
To: James Croll <JamesCroll@hssaustralia.com.au>
Subject: draft

hi this is what the text looks like as a draft. still making some adjustments

how many photos can I include?

F
